storyInfo: Siege helps Allerdale keep the steam armor. Catherine meets her grandson, Feist, but cannot trust him easily.

attributes.content: We have a signal, Amiya!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Casters! Hold the shield with me!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Everyone else, get to the corner!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Sarkaz casters raise their staves together.
Monsters made of blood rush up from underground. The entire street opens its gaping maw beneath the soldiers.
Nnghâ€”!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's too many of them!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Black lines cut through the flesh of the monsters, but even more rise again from the fallen, gnawing away at the Arts forming a defensive barrier.
The fighters run for their lives, but the stench from the predators' jaws is never far behind.
Finally, they make it into another alley, and find themselves face-to-face with an aura that is potent, pure and fearsome.
Stop.
The bloody tide stops in its tracks.
It was as though they ran into an invisible wall when they rounded the corner. The maggot-shaped Arts creations smash themselves into pieces, leaving bloody trails on the ground.
The empty street is completely silent.
Casualties?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We're fine. We got out quick enough.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I hope we've delayed the Sarkaz, made things safer for Allerdale and Siege...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Thanks, everyone, especially our Self-Salvation Corps friends. Thank you for being willing to take this risk with us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Commander Clovisia calls Rhodes Island our most important ally. We're always ready to do what we have to.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Plus, if this Rhodes Island operator here hadn't helped us, that Vampire would've done all of us in a long time ago.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: No need to thank me.
I've seen too much meaningless killing in Londinium. I must stop my compatriots who have gone too far.
Sorry, Doctor...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.options: I thought I was just coming home with you.;Are we not welcome?

attributes.content: I had, er, a little fight with Granny when I skipped out of the factory last year.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: A dozen big, bruising workers surround you.
Their eyes are filled with suspicion.
You glance at the drills and spanners in their hands, then at Feist, dressed like the workers, but here on his own.

attributes.options: Seems like it was more than a little fight.;Are you sure they're not hostiles?

attributes.content: I guess Granny is still sore at me...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I've got no reason to be sore at a dead man. I didn't even know my only grandson was still alive, 'til a minute ago.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I wanted to send a message, but it was too risky. The Sarkaz monitor all communications into Highbury.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I can't let the Sarkaz tie you to the Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: So you joined that band of crackpots.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: ...The Londinium Citizens' Self-Salvation Corps.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We did a lot in Sudean, Granny. The Sarkaz control the media, and they call us an 'unnamed violent gang'...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You're the ones who blew up the wall.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Er... it was the Do...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.options: The Sarkaz damaged the walls while pursuing the Corps.;Your grandson fought bravely in the battle.

attributes.content: Right... it was mostly the Sarkaz who did it.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Thanks, Doctor.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I didn't know you had such high regard for my rope work.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: So you're here to blow up the armory?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Of course not!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: What did you say to your Self-Salvation Corps friends? We're making weapons for the Sarkaz, to use against Victorians?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: No, Granny. What I told them was...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: My granny stands up to protect their livelihoods.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I know you think I'm a brat with little more than a couple of silly tricks.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: But I didn't come back to drag the workers into this. And I'm not here to try to convince you, either.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I have my goals, of course, and it'd be brilliant if you were able to help me. But firstâ€”
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I just wanted to see that you're safe.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Come here, and let me have a look at you.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Granny...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: You've put on a few inches, brat.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Yeah, I grew a little bit.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I'll have the goods soon.
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: A suit of steam armor... how many men would kill to get one like it?
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: The nobles of Leithanien love to flaunt such storied antiques.
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: Oh, and do be sure to ask those Columbian firms as well. They might be interested, even if the tech is centuries old.
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: Getting it out will be no trouble at all. What business do you think I'm running in Londinium these days?
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: The Sarkaz are a gang of raving psychopaths, and they alone can't rule Londinium.
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: I have friends in the Defense Forces. They'll take care of it for me.
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: I've heard it has a few external blemishes, however. I do hope that won't hurt the price?
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: Why not cancel the deal, if you're so worried about the price?
Who's there?!
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: Don't worry, we just happened to be traveling the same way.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Get this intruder out of here!
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: Say... where are my bodyguards?
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: I've asked them to take a short nap. You can go and wake them once we've finished our chat.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: All of them...? Against just one of you?!
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: One? Oh, my, no.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Look behind you.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You... this is Londinium! I've got friends in high places!
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: Oh? Where are they? Do tell, I bet I'd get on famously.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Eek! D-Don't do anything rash, now!
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: Play nice with us and nobody has to get beat.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Whatever Siege says, you do.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Otherwise, my claws won't be aimed at the wall next time.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: A-Alright! I understand!
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: ...Seriously?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: You really got into it there.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I learned it from you lot.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Now then, let him go.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: *whimper*...
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: You can open your eyes and put your hands down now, Mr. Bader. We're not going to hurt you... at least not yet.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What do you want?
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: My terms are clear. Cancel the deal for the Cumberland steam armor.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And you'll let me go if I agree?
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But I'll make sure you keep your side of the bargain.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Show Mr. Bader our map, Morgan.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: With pleasure.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: The marks on the map... those are my warehouses! How do you know about them?!
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: You don't pay much attention when you're out and about.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You shadowed me?
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: Correct. The Sarkaz cannot be bribed. If they learn that you've smuggled so much contraband into Londinium through your 'connections'...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: How helpful do you think your friend will be? Will he be in any position to protect you?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You're considering tipping off the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: That may well get us all killed, but they won't have to know anything if you continue to work with us.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Do I have a choice?
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: I understand your circumstances, and I appreciate the opportunity to work with you. You will be compensated fairly.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Wait a second...
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: What is your relationship to Allerdale Cumberland? Are you her attendant? I can't imagine House Cumberland is in any position to hire one...
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: Watch your mouth! The Cumberland serves Vina, not the other way 'round!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: She's the daughter of a duke! You don't mean...
attributes.name: Londinium Merchant

attributes.content: No. I'm nobody.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Lady Cumberland and I are comrades, along with thousands upon thousands of Londiniers who long for peace.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I do hope you're one of them, Mr. Bader.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: All those loyal to this land stand with me. The final battle against evil lies before us.
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: Children... do you live here?
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: Hide not in the corners and shadows. Even if you cannot hold a sword...
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: There is more to being a warrior than simply holding a sword. Open your eyes. Watch, listen, think.
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: Tell me what is right, what is wrong, and what kind of life you wish to live.
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: I march onwards, with you as my witnesses.
attributes.name: Knight

attributes.content: Brilliant! Look how good Ralph is, Lady Golding... how much he's grown. And to think he was a mischievous little beastling just four years ago!
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Yes, I'm delighted. A handkerchief, Molly?
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Handkerchief? Oh, yes, I can't stain my clothes with tears in front of the children... Oh, but I just can't stop crying, to think that Ralph and the other kids will be leaving school so soon...
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: It's time for them to have a rest. And us, too.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Yes, the final scene... that's the best part.
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: Who's clapping?
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: You didn't invite anyone to the rehearsal today, did you?
attributes.name: Molly

attributes.content: The teachers cast their glances toward the back of the classroom.
A man in military attire claps slowly by the door.
What a splendid performance.
...Lt. Colonel Lettou.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: I didn't think the Commander of the Defense Forces would grace this classroom with his presence.
attributes.name: Golding

attributes.content: Good afternoon, ladies.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou
